entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 09:43 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -40.4°C
Wind: NNW 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
